name: Magician Clans: 13 Days to the End Demo
name_original: Magician Clans: 13 Days to the End Demo
description: When twenty year old Jaelyn of the Rose Waifs comes across circumstances eerily similar to those surrounding the disappearance of her sister, she can't stop herself from investigating. Set in the fictional city of Kikokanai, specifically the Hayakami suburb, The Magician Clans follows the adventure of a young man or woman who becomes embroiled in a war between two such groups following the advent of a coming magical apocalypse. Choose a side, discover strange powers, and maybe even find love in this fast paced rollercoaster of a visual novel. Get a sneak peek of what’s possible with the demos.
